title: Best(est) Horror film ever
review: I am a big fan of Horror movies and creepy climaxes. This movie is just perfect and pretty good. The job of Horror movie is to pump the adrenaline and this movie perfectly doing the job given to it, unlike most of the other horror films that includes obscene stuffs in between. Worth watching !

title: Best movie !
review: One of the best movies I have ever seen. Though it's an old movie, I bet it can compete any other movie in this category at any period of time.
